summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of Linden Ave. North, from North 85th Street to North 100th Street; and certain other streets, avenues and easements; by grading, graveling, constructing concrete sidewalks, constructing storm drains and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Resolution No. 16965 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds."
